entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Controller for HomeKit
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Lifetime licenseÔºö‚Ç∫4.499,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫1.499,99 [‚Ç∫1.499,99 ~ ‚Ç∫4.499,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • PRO yearly subscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99
  • Lifetime licenseÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99
  • Monthly SubscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫109,99
  • Yearly SubscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫459,99

Application Description

Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility. * FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan. * COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs. * NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home. * BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed. * SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters. * WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home. * SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost. * MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken. * LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home. * WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan. Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be. For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com Privacy Policy: https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/ Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Day R Premium
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Handful of capsÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

In-App Purchases

  • Handful of capsÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Pile of capsÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Sausepan of capsÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Special packÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Small packÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Great packÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Useful packÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Standart packÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Case with capsÔºö‚Ç∫899,99
  • Survival kitÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together. Benefits of Premium version: - Unique pet Raven - Starter Kit - Caches of useful items in shelters - Expanded selection of perks - Chat without any limitations - Reduced waiting time between parcels - Access to all kinds and colors of map markers Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies ‚Äì you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. - Hardcore survival: Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax. - Realistic world: The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness! - A lot of opportunities: Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition. - People and stories: Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world. - Improve your skills: Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others. - Cooperative mode: The Online mode with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game. Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials. Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! Features: - –°raft system ‚Äì get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! - Hardcore simulator of survival - Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode - Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other. User agreement: http://tltgames.ru/license-agreement-en

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Motorsport Manager 4
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • BundleÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

In-App Purchases

  • Very Large InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Huge InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • BundleÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Large InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Premium livery bundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success. ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination. REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars. UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry. DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey. YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you. SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: iScore5 APHG
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

iScore5‚Ñ¢ APHG is a test prep app to get students ready for the AP¬Æ Human Geography exam. The app created by EXPERT teachers for AP Human Geography Students. The goal is simple: Help students maximize their scores on the AP exam in a FUN way. Everything is designed like a trivia game for students, with running scores, leaderboards, bonus and double bonus rounds. Plus, you have the ability to unlock levels as you progress through levels of learning. iScore5 APHG has two major components. First, there is a practice vocabulary section that contains the MOST important terms from EVERY unit from the class. Our second component is where the FUN begins. 5 levels of multiple-choice questions that you must unlock as you score points. These questions come from each AP Human Geography unit. Level 1 has easier questions and level 5 contains the most challenging. As you move through the levels, your learning improves. Don‚Äôt worry about the quality of these questions! All of the question writers are experienced expert AP Human Geography Teachers or Geography College Professors. They know about the class and they know what types of questions to ask to prepare you for the AP exam. But remember, they know you WANT TO HAVE FUN while you learn! Think about it. Stop carrying all that review stuff. The best reason we have for the app is when your mom sees you on your phone you can say, ‚ÄúI AM STUDYING FOR THE AP HUMAN GEOGRAPHY EXAM!‚Äù Highlights: A running scoreboard A leaderboard to see how you do against other students A paperless way to prepare for the AP Human Geography exam 21st century learning and gaming Disclaimer: AP and Advanced Placement are registered trademarks of the College Board, which was not involved in the production of, and does not endorse, this product. ¬© iScore5 App, LLC. All rights reserved. The text of this app, or any part thereof, may not be reproduced in any manner without the written permission from the publisher.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

„ÄåCard.Note„ÄçÔºöÊØè‰∏™ÂøµÂ§¥ÈÉΩÂÄºÂæóÁî®ÂøÉËÆ∞ÂΩï ËøôÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ¨æ‰ª•Âç°Áâá‰∏∫‰∏ªË¶ÅËÆæËÆ°ÁêÜÂøµÁöÑÊûÅÁÆÄËÆ∞‰∫ã App „ÄÇ ‰Ω†ÂÜôÁöÑÊØè‰∏ÄÊÆµÊñáÂ≠óÈÉΩÂèØ‰ª•ÁîüÊàê‰∏ÄÂº†Âº†Á≤æÁæéÁöÑÂç°Áâá „ÄÇ ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•Áî®ÂÆÉÊù•ÂÜôËØó„ÄÅÁü≠Êñá„ÄÅÈöèÊÉ≥Ôºõ ‰πüÂèØ‰ª•Áî®ÂÆÉÊù•ÂÜôÊó•ËÆ∞„ÄÅÊ∏ÖÂçï„ÄÅËßÑÂàí„ÄÅË¶Å‰∫ãÊèêÈÜíÔºõ ËøòÂèØ‰ª•Áõ¥Êé•Áî®ËØ≠Èü≥ËæìÂÖ•Êù•ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™Áû¨Èó¥ÁöÑÂøµÂ§¥„ÄÇ „ÄåCard.Note„Äç‰πùÂ§ßÁâπÁÇπÔºö 1.ÊûÅÁÆÄËÆæËÆ° Âæ™ÁùÄÊûÅÁÆÄÁöÑËÆæËÆ°ÁêÜÂøµÔºåÁªìÂêàÂõæÊ†áÂèäÊâãÂäøÊìç‰ΩúÔºåËΩªÊùæ‰∏äÊâã„ÄÇ 2.ÂÖ®Â±ÄÂç°ÁâáÂåñ ÂÖÖÂàÜËûçÂÖ•‰∫ÜÂç°ÁâáËÆæËÆ°ÁêÜÂøµÔºåÂèØÊ†πÊçÆÂñúÂ•ΩÈöèÊÑèÂàáÊç¢Ê®™ÁâàÊàñÁ´ñÁâà‰∏§ÁßçÂç°ÁâáÁ¨îËÆ∞ÊòæÁ§∫Ê†∑Âºè„ÄÇ 3.ÂÖ®Â±ÄÊâãÂäøÂåñ ‰∏ãÊãâÂèØÊñ∞Âª∫Á¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÂÜç‰∏ãÊãâÂèØ‰øùÂ≠òÁ¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÂè≥ÊªëÂèØÂëºÂá∫‰ΩúÂìÅÈõÜÔºåÈïøÊåâÂç°ÁâáÂèØÈ¢ÑËßàÂç°ÁâáÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÄÇ 4.ËØ≠Èü≥ÂΩïÂÖ• ÊâìÂºÄ‰æøÂèØÁõ¥Êé•ËØ≠Èü≥ËæìÂÖ•ÔºåÈöèÊó∂ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™ÁÅµÂÖâÊòæÁé∞ÁöÑÊÉ≥Ê≥ï„ÄÇ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•ÊääÂÆÉÂΩì‰ΩúÊàêiOSÊñáËâ∫Áâà‚ÄúÈó™ÂøµËÉ∂Âõä‚Äù„ÄÇ 5.Ë¶Å‰∫ãÊèêÈÜíÔºö ÂèØËÆæÁΩÆÊèêÈÜíÈóπÁßçÔºåÈáçË¶Å‰∫ãÊÉÖÂíåËÆ°Âàí‰∏çÂÜçÈîôÂ§±„ÄÇ 6.Âø´Êç∑È´òÊïà ÊîØÊåÅ3D-TouchÂèäWidgetÂ∞èÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂäüËÉΩÔºåÂèØÁõ¥Êé•Âú®Â∫îÁî®ÂõæÊ†áÊàñWidgetÂø´ÈÄüÊâìÂºÄÂ∫îÁî®ÊàñÁõ¥Êé•ËøõÂÖ•ÂàõÂª∫Á¨îËÆ∞ÁïåÈù¢ÔºåËÆ©‰Ω†ÈöèÊó∂È´òÊïàÂú∞ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™ÂøµÂ§¥„ÄÇ 7.ÊñáÈùíÂÆöÂà∂ Á≤æÈÄâ‰∫Ü 10 Ê¨æËÆ∞‰∫ãÂ≠ó‰ΩìÂèä 9 ÁßçÊñáÈùí‰∏ªÈ¢òËâ≤Âç°„ÄÅÂ§öËææ 100 Áßç‰∏çÂêåÈ¢úËâ≤ÁöÑËâ≤Âç°ÔºåÂèØÊ†πÊçÆÂñúÂ•ΩÂÆöÂà∂ÂêÑÁßçÂç°Áâá„ÄÇ 8.iCloud‰∫ëÂêåÊ≠• ÊîØÊåÅiCloud‰∫ëÂêåÊ≠•ÔºåÂ§öÂè∞ËÆæÂ§áÈó¥Êï∞ÊçÆÂèØ‰ªªÊÑèÂêåÊ≠•„ÄÇ 9.Ê∑±Ëâ≤Ê®°Âºè ÂÖ®Â±ÄÈÄÇÈÖçÊ∑±Ëâ≤Ê®°ÂºèÔºåËßÜËßâËàíÈÄÇ‰∏çÂà∫Áúº„ÄÇ ÊÑüË∞¢‰∏ãËΩΩÔºåÁîüÊ¥ªÊÑâÂø´„ÄÇ Â¶ÇÊúâÈóÆÈ¢òÊàñÂª∫ËÆÆÔºåËØ∑ËÅîÁ≥ªÂºÄÂèëËÄÖ ÂæÆÂçöÔºöPoPoemÂºÄÂèëËÄÖ ÈÇÆÁÆ±Ôºöyande18@126.com

entry.title: The Witness
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you. You don't remember who you are, and you don't remember how you got here, but there's one thing you can do: explore the island in hope of discovering clues, regaining your memory, and somehow finding your way home. The Witness is a single-player game in an open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 500 puzzles. This game respects you as an intelligent player and it treats your time as precious. There's no filler; each of those puzzles brings its own new idea into the mix. So, this is a game full of ideas.

Application Screenshot

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

On Sale. Original $ 4.99. Photo Eraser magically remove unwanted objects from photos for iPhone and instantly fix your photos. Powered by the latest revolutionary photo InPaint algorithm, Photo Eraser performs the best among all other iPhone erasers that ruin your photos, including popular professional photo processing softwares. A variety of experiments shows the intelligent Photo Eraser will give you better and more natural, amazing results than any similar tools. Photo Eraser quickly remove unwanted objects from photos for iPhone, including logo, text, data stamp, watermark, acnes, people... without any specialist knowledge and instantly fix the photos automatically as if they were never there. InPaint, improve and repair your photos. It targets to be a simple yet effective photo healing app for all iPhone users. Get the magical photos done in seconds-to-minutes instead of minutes-to-hours. People all over the world use Photo Eraser for iPhone every day to beautify their photos. Free download Eraser for iPhone today to be more creativity! Easy to get use & started. You only need mark unwanted area by red color, Photo Eraser for iPhone will make your photo much better in a minute. ‚Ä®‚Ä® Photo Eraser for iPhone features highlights: ‚Ä® ‚àö Remove watermarks, date stamps and much more unwanted objects from photos for iPhone.‚Ä® ‚àö Delete unwanted people from photo for iPhone. ‚Ä® ‚àö Erase text, signatures and other undated objects from photos for iPhone. ‚Ä® ‚àö Make skin imperfections vanish for iPhone. ‚Ä® ‚àö Completely non-technical. ‚àö Support all iPhone device: iPhone 6s+, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6+, iPhone6, iPhone 5s, iPhone5c, iPhones 5, iPhones 4s, iPhone4, iPhone 3gs‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¢ Reviews by our users: - Works pretty well! by rfgf1 It does a fairly thorough job of removing things from the backgrounds of pictures, or objects that are not in the main focus of the original. Using the lasso and only straight lines and drawing a box around the object to be removed, is where I have seen my best results. - Amazing by Twon from VA Works great! I'm using a iPhone 6, IOS 8 Feedback: ‚Ä®Any suggestion will be appreciated, support email: market@effectmatrix.com

  • Foxman OutfitÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Super Hero World BundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now! Voted "Best Digital Board Game‚Äù in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021 Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! It‚Äôs a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don‚Äôt. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts! Features The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life. ‚Ä¢ A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams ‚Ä¢ *NEW* VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat ‚Ä¢ AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions ‚Ä¢ 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese ‚Ä¢ SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI ‚Ä¢ ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game ‚Ä¢ PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience How to play CUSTOMISE your character Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own. SPIN THE SPINNER The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose? It‚Äôs your LIFE PATH Get married or don‚Äôt, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours! More WAYS TO WIN Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid. RETIRE your way Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on! Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards! In-game Video Chat Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It‚Äôs super easy to set-up and play: ‚Ä¢ Create your free private account ‚Ä¢ Invite your friends and family to chat groups ‚Ä¢ Start games straight from those chats ‚Ä¢ Play face-to-face wherever you are It‚Äôs simple, seamless fun for everyone. The Ultimate Life Collection Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

Application Description

BECOME THE ULTIMATE SILENT ASSASSIN Step into the shoes of Agent 47 in Hitman: Sniper and discover the most compelling sniper experience on mobile. TACTICAL MISSIONS IN MONTENEGRO Hone your strategic skills and orchestrate the perfect assassination. ACTION ZOMBIE CHALLENGE IN DEATH VALLEY Prepare for non-stop action in a true test of your accuracy and speed of execution. MORE THAN 150 MISSIONS AND 11 DIFFERENT CONTRACTS Improve your strategy for the perfect assassination as you uncover secrets and subterfuges. 17 UNIQUE WEAPONS Eliminate targets, collect weapon parts and complete blueprints to unlock the most powerful rifles. COMPETE AGAINST YOUR FRIENDS TO DOMINATE THE LEADERBOARD Boost your score and climb up the ranks to become the world's finest silent assassin. Hitman: Sniper is memory intensive. Devices such as iPad 2, iPad Mini, iPhone 4S and iPod Touch 5th Generation will suffer from occasional dips in performance and will not support Everyplay.

  • Private Donor UnlockÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Can you stop the Insurgency? From the creator of Plague Inc. comes a unique and deeply engaging political/military strategic simulation. The war is ‚Äòover‚Äô - but we all know that doesn‚Äôt mean anything. To stabilise the country, you need to balance military and civilian priorities to win the hearts and minds of the people, whilst also stopping insurgents from seizing power! Rebel Inc. is the brand new game from the creator of ‚ÄòPlague Inc.‚Äô - one of the most popular paid games ever with over 130 million players. Brilliantly executed with beautiful graphics and critically acclaimed gameplay - Rebel Inc. offers a deeply engaging, strategic challenge inspired by the complexities and consequences of modern counter insurgency. ‚óà‚óà‚óà #1 top paid game globally ‚óà‚óà‚óà ‚ñ∂ ‚ÄúRebel Inc. lets everyone wrestle with the messy challenges of post-conflict recovery and better understand the complex realities of building peace.‚Äù - World Bank Global Lead for Stability, Peace and Security ‚ñ∂ "Highly rewarding spiritual sequel to one of the App Store's biggest hits." - Pocket Tactics ‚ñ∂ "Surprisingly sophisticated... even better than some of the stabilization training software I have seen in government use" - PAXsims ‚ñ∂ "Rebel Inc. is fascinating and fun" - 148Apps.com ‚ñ∂ "Another great game and a worthy successor to Plague Inc" - App Store review ‚ñ∂ "If you love strategy games then this is the game for you" - App Store review ‚ñ∂ "Brilliant game, the gameplay is interesting and the strategy is intuitive!" - App Store review ‚ñ∂ "Unlike anything I‚Äôve played on here before" - App Store review ‚óà‚óà‚óà Features: ‚óè Stabilise 9 richly modeled regions ‚óè Innovative representation of counter insurgency tactics ‚óè Fund realistic initiatives to empower the local government ‚óè Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world based on extensive research ‚óè Intelligent strategic and tactical AI ‚óè Sophisticated narrative algorithms shaped by your decisions ‚óè 8 unique governors with radically different abilities ‚óè Conduct large-scale Operations in Campaign mode ‚óè Play new generated Challenges every week ‚óè 13 Official Scenarios including disease outbreaks, helicopters and advanced insurgents ‚óè Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system ‚óè Full Save/Load functionality ‚óè Internet connectivity not required An important note: Although a fictional game, Rebel Inc. looks at important real world issues and we have made every effort to deal with them sensitively. The game has been extensively researched and has been developed in cooperation with leading regional politicians, business people and journalists as well as international charities, experts and governments. Rebel Inc. is now fully localised in English, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Korean, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), and Russian. Special sale price to celebrate the launch of the game! ‚óà‚óà‚óà I‚Äôve got lots of plans for updates! Get in touch and let me know what you want to see. James (the designer) Contact me here: www.ndemiccreations.com/en/1-support Follow me on Twitter: www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations
